title: Sketchbook Folio, "Blinded Soldier, Detail from the Conversion of St. Paul, Study after Agostino Carracci", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: Agostino Carracci Bologna / 170
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Soldier in classical dress, with billowing cloak, helmet, and sword, plunges forward, lunging on his right leg, his arms protecting his face and eyes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Blinded Soldier, Detail from the Conversion of St. Paul, Study after Agostino Carracci", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3564.
